name: Macrotransactions Included
description:
Executive Cobra is leading a hostile takeover. She doesn't have time to deal with obstacles and puzzles in her way. Help Executive Cobra pay her way to victory with her endless supply of credit cards.

Submission to the Bruised Egos Game Jam. This is a very short puzzle/adventure game featuring Executive Cobra and her awesome robot power suit.

Basic controls:

  • Movement: Arrow Keys
  • Select: Z
  • Cancel / Menu: X
